<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/classes/{classid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves detailed information for a specific class within an organization.  Requires authentication.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"The unique identifier for the organization.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"classid","in":"path","description":"The unique identifier for the class.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token for authorization.  Must be a valid JWT.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
